Name: Graze
Description: Discard the top card of the encounter deck.

Name: Thrash About
Description: If you have shuffled your discard pile into your deck this game, deal 1 damage to each enemy.

Name: Poke Around
Description:
Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies.
Recover 2 vitality.

Name: Keep Watch
Description: Draw two cards from your deck.

Name: Bolt
Description: If you have shuffled your discard pile into your deck this game, skip tonight's attack step.

Name: Ram Through
Description:
If you have shuffled your discard pile into your deck this game, deal 2 damage to one or two enemies.
Otherwise, draw two cards from your deck and discard a hero card from your hand.

Name: Drive Away
Description: Shuffle one non-elite enemy into the encounter deck.
